reviewText: These are great videos for beginners. First off , Veena and Neena are lovely. Very lovely to look at and you sense that their personalities are lovely too. Some instructors come across as wooden or you don't feel encouraged, but not with these ladies. Secondly, start with the Basic Moves video. It really is for beginners and is a nice introduction to belly dance for fitness. It's a slower pace and low impact. Perfect if you are out of shape or haven't worked out in awhile. Or, if like me, it takes you awhile to get your rhythm. I really do like the Basic Moves for those days when my brain refuses to think anymore or I'm completely stressed out and my body feels it. I get a nice workout and feel like my muscles have relaxed. Great way to relieve tension. The Fat Burning is more challenging. I had most of their tapes, back in the days of VHS. The Fat Burning wasn't really my favorite. It's not the ladies, maybe some of the moves? Maybe not challenging enough? Either way, still a great DVD and worth the money. I favored their Slim Down DVD over the Fat Burning. Any of their DVDs are worth the money. They are fun and challenging and a great workout.
It was just what I ordered. It was shipped in a timely manner and I'm extremely pleased.
This is a very good DVD and I really enjoy workout with. I t really give you a workout and plus you are learning some belly dances moves. So I would recommence this to other. E. Norton
I've had this video on VHS and now I'm so happy to have it on DVD! Woohoo!
A must do! Great workout for those who do not want to work out. The music is soooo relaxing!
I liked the Basic Moves portion but the Fat Burning movements were too repetitive. I have the Slim Down dvd that I prefer over this.
This is a really great DVD. It's easy enough to follow and is a hell of a workout at the same time. These girls know what they're doing!
